thread.title: Linz title success for Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova
thread.title_full: Linz title success for Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova

title: Linz title success for Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova
text:
Linz title success for Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 18 Oct 2015 15:01:57 
comments 
Russian Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova's 15th successive indoor match victory saw her lift the Generali Ladies Linz title. 
The 24-year-old, winner of the Paris and Moscow indoor titles in 2014, overcame a thigh problem to beat Anna-Lena Friedsam 6-4 6-3. 
Pavlyuchenkova, who arrived on court with strapping on her right thigh and required treatment during the match, dropped just one set on her way to the Austrian title and her dominance continued in the final, where she lost only six service points in the opening set and three in the second.
